channel.title: 2007-scape RSPS Re-make!|| Looking for a development team
channel.description:
2007-SCAPE RSPS! We are looking for a development team Server features [spoiler]Features; Many donator features All Dupes FIXED ~ All Exploits FIXED ~ Client UID Added ~ Webclient + Download Client ~ 2 Registred Domains ~ Duel Arena Staking 100% NO DUPES ~ Player Following Clipped! ~ Active Pking / Staking ~ Dice Game 100% ~ 50-120 Players Online 24/7 ~ NO LAG! ~ Barrows FIXED ~ Great Economy! PK Clanwars ( adding soon ) Slayer working 100% Construction 100% woodcutting 100% Every skill is working 100% VPS 24/7 Donatorpoints shop PK/PVP/PVM bosses working [/spoiler] Serverdeveloper: 0/2 Graphic designer: 0/2 [u]Server Developer[/u] Coding the server, making ideas, adding stuff and fixing bugs and much more! [u] Graphic designer[/u] Who is in-charge of the forums for graphic design, when people request for a graphic you make them one and when the server needs one you will have to make one.
Application What job?(Graphicdesign,serverdeveloper): Name: Rate your english (0/10) : What could you improve on the server: Aboutyourself:

item.title: 2007-scape RSPS Re-make!|| Looking for a development team
item.dc:creator: @Fryslan Fryslan
item.description:
@Fryslan wrote:

What job?(Graphicdesign,serverdeveloper): Server Developer
Name: Username - Fryslan IRL Name - Piet
Rate your english (0/10) : 7
What could you improve on the server: Updating the Map, Fixing bugs, etc.
Aboutyourself: Ive worked on a few RSPS clients but got most of my java skill through coding for bots(Scripts and API) since I got some spare time on my hands i’ve decided to get back into RSPS coding.

Feel free to contact me:
Skype : Piet Jetse Heeringa

item.title: 2007-scape RSPS Re-make!|| Looking for a development team
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stPred Gh0stPred
item.description:
@Gh0stPred wrote:

Application
What job? (Graphic Design,Server Developer): Server Developer
Name: John (IGN: Gh0stPred)
Rate your English (0/10): 10 (Im from England so :D)
What could you improve on the server: Stuff that people find boring (NPC Drops, Spawns, Dialogue, Animations, Special Weapons, Teleports, Commands and everything like that)
About yourself: I am 18 years old who is currently in College. I love music Games and RSPS and always loved being in the RSPS scene. Been on Moparscape since Jan 2009 and made some good RSPS’s. I love doing the small boring stuff because it gives me something to do because no one wants to sort out the drops and Npc’s and everything like that

Read full topic

item.title: 2007-scape RSPS Re-make!|| Looking for a development team
item.dc:creator: @TheyCallMeNitro TheyCallMeNitro
item.description:
@TheyCallMeNitro wrote:

Hello,

I can help out with coding the server as a developer.

I have a pretty great amount of understanding and writing code. I can bring good ideas, more players, and more success.
You would not regret adding me onto the development team. I look forward to working with you and developing the server. Thanks :).

Application
What job?(Graphicdesign,serverdeveloper): Server Developer
Name: Username - Nitro IRL Name - Ryley
Rate your english (0/10) : 10
What could you improve on the server: Bringing ideas, fixing bugs, and bringing in more players.
Aboutyourself: I am a hard worker and have worked on many different RSPS’s before, I have always been interested in ‘Old-School’ type servers. ;D

-TheyCallMeNitro

Read full topic

item.title: 2007-scape RSPS Re-make!|| Looking for a development team
item.dc:creator: @DivineX DivineX
item.description:
@DivineX wrote:

2007-SCAPE RSPS!

We are looking for a development team
Server features
[spoiler]Features;
Many donator features
All Dupes FIXED
~ All Exploits FIXED
~ Client UID Added
~ Webclient + Download Client
~ 2 Registred Domains
~ Duel Arena Staking 100% NO DUPES
~ Player Following Clipped!
~ Active Pking / Staking
~ Dice Game 100%
~ 50-120 Players Online 24/7
~ NO LAG!
~ Barrows FIXED
~ Great Economy!
PK
Clanwars ( adding soon )
Slayer working 100%
Construction 100%
woodcutting 100%
Every skill is working 100%
VPS 24/7
Donatorpoints shop
PK/PVP/PVM
bosses working [/spoiler]

Serverdeveloper: 0/2
Graphic designer: 0/2

Server Developer
Coding the server, making ideas, adding stuff and fixing bugs and much more!

Graphic designer
Who is in-charge of the forums for graphic design, when people request for a graphic you make them one and when the server needs one you will have to make one.
